question: Which of the following is the composition of vinegar?
option1: 65-75% solution of acetic acid in water
option2: 45-60% solution of acetic acid in water
option3: 28-35% solution of acetic acid in water
option4: 5-8% solution of acetic acid in water
answer: 5-8% solution of acetic acid in water
explanation: 5-8% solution of acetic acid in water is called vinegar and is used widely as a preservative in pickles
